description: Lists all members of the specified project.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which you want to list project memberships.

parameters.name: projectIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the project whose memberships you want to list.

nested_items.name: designation
nested_items.description: The designated role of a project member.

nested_items.name: memberDetails
nested_items.description: The membership details of a project member.

nested_items.name: groupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the group in Amazon DataZone.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone user.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of memberships is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of memberships, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListProjectMemberships to list the next set of memberships.
